alert.note: Alert for Central Columbia River Gorge; Upper Hood River Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 28 at 8:46PM PST until November 30 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches possible. * WHERE...Central Columbia Gorge and the Hood River Valley. This includes portions of Interstate 84, Washington Highway 14, and Oregon Highway 35. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the commute Tuesday evening and Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is a potential for significant snow, sleet, or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Central Columbia River Gorge; Upper Hood River Valley
